verbs.description: [ARG1: hammer] - [V: wielding] [ARG0: man] bashes straphanger in head after argument in nyc station authorities are looking for a man in his late 20s who allegedly bashed an older man in the head with a hammer after an argument in a bronx subway station earlier this month according to the nypd nypd new york city police department man
